text: "We have seen the other side.  We must master the potential it affords us."
"The ritual went awry.  We can't stay here."
"No sign of them.  Must've abandoned the place and left it to rot.  But why ...?"
"The witch-hunters think they can stop this.  Think they can stop us.  The barrier is already crumbling, they can't undo this."
"The summoning is almost complete.  We shall behold true power!"
"Gods above and below, what did those maniacs bring forth?  What have they DONE?"
"Those fools actually believe a bunch of blood mages caused all this?  Tore down the barrier between worlds?  I don't know what caused it, but the others only exacerbated the problem."
"We shall bring forth our master.  The old gods shall we swept away, as we cast aside the veil of reality..."
"The ritual blade was tainted by dark magic, it drew forth something else.  Not our master, not He From Beyond The Veil."
"We fear the worst may soon happen.  But so long as the Sun shines upon the Earth, we will fight back."
"I think they might be right.  The Sanguine Order didn't cause this.  Something else wore down the barrier between worlds, and they merely exploited that breach."
"We set up a blade ward to seal off the lower level.  This place is no longer safe, something ...something evil subverted our only refuge."
"IT'S FLOATING!  THE TEMPLE IS FLOATING!"
"Funny story-- on Hour One, instead of getting massacred by zombies or absorbed by fungus, I got burned to a crisp by two fucking dragonspawn."
"all these demons from their many hells, there is an ORDER to it, i KNOW there is"
"Thanks for the magic spear, jackass!"
"Hey, this isn't fair!  I was only in the cult for the free robes and after-ritual donuts!  I didn't sign up for ANY of this!"
"I never considered myself one of religion-- yet the lightning from my hands and my Many-Tendrilled Thralls compel me to believe."
"so when's cthulhu showing up?"
"this has gotta be a joke.  alien monsters, sure.  magical essence?  pssh.  probably just a sick prank"
"Dear Roger, Chappy, Allison and Tom, the cultists that showed up frantically on my doorstep and are currently using my basement for your ritual-- I hope you like molotovs."
"Man.  You ever just... hung out with a summoned kreck for a while?  On the beach?  Barked about life, and Cl'hxh'dhiik?"
"Blood spills from my athame.  It is his blood.  Is he reborn, revitalized through my practices?  Can I ever repay him for his sacrifice?"
"This is NOT A REAL CHURCH"
"alchemy is boring if you aren't taste-testing your potions, to be honest"
"Ah, yes... I shall hammer this smoke into smaller, dull bits of smoke!"
"Boy, this weather's sure been odd since I raided that mansion!"
"GOOD BOY MOLD-- NO CAR-EATING, NO CAR-EATING, PLEASE"
"do not bbuurn hhiss rrelliics"
"funny paper did a thing!  feeling great, but everything is tree."
